short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Too many tabs? Can't find anything? Replace the new tab page with a grid of images! Now you can add even more tabs!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Replaces your new tab page with a grid. Click to navigate to a tab, save pages by clicking on the checkbox, or by clicking on the extension icon.

Has hotkeys to save pages, unsave pages, and go to the next save page (see chrome://extensions/shortcuts).

Edit mode also allows quickly cleaning up tabs, mass closing or mass saving them.

File bug reports here: https://github.com/sliftist/ext-tabs/issues

Contribute to the app here: https://github.com/sliftist/ext-tabs/
